title: Stvru
author: Stvru

content: Plz help i cant sent any

comments.author: EL MOHA
comments.body: It’s not blocked or blacklisted but it has no bitcoin or even satoshi left which is why you can’t send any bitcoin

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Creative begging. Nice try, but I'm not doing to send you Bitcoin just to confirm Bitcoin addresses can't be blocked.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on September 03, 2023, 09:12:01 PMCreative begging.Total Received 0.05983735 BTC, seems lucrative.But: https://ninjastic.space/address/19fCVjYVuppjhSvZc4fYimLSjTv63SyoYDthe business did start in 2017 so it looks less impressive taking that into account.

comments.author: Stvru
comments.body: I thinks iam legendry in this job , when u like me resolve to me my problem

comments.author: WillyAp
comments.body: The blockchain explorer gives out 2 Addresses:There are 2 blockchains with result(s) to your search:Quote19fCVjYVuppjhSvZc4fYimLSjTv63SyoYDBTCAddress 19fCV-SyoYDBCHAddress 19fCV-SyoYD

comments.author: light_warrior
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on September 03, 2023, 09:12:01 PMCreative begging. Nice try, but I'm not doing to send you Bitcoin just to confirm Bitcoin addresses can't be blocked.This is not the first time this comrade has begged on the forum. Back in 2017 he tried to do it from another account trying to sell some bitcoin mining method (as I understand). That account got banned and he decided to try his luck again  So what he deserves is a ban for evasion.More here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5094661.msg62792751#msg62792751

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: You can't receive so you want someone to send you?  @OP, you can do that on your own. You might have other wallets in you that has some balance so do the experiment and honor to yourself. Quote from: Stvru on September 03, 2023, 09:18:03 PMI thinks iam legendry in this job , when u like me resolve to me my problemReplying to your own concern? See, you can solve that on your own.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: I am sure that knowledge has already dawned upon the OP therefore he knew what he was doing when he created this thread. Now, if anybody does make the mistake of sending him anything they will encourage more scam behaviour.His alt-account btcpepa04 tried a different technique to get free Bitcoin in 2017 Quote from: EL MOHA on September 03, 2023, 09:11:48 PMIt’s not blocked or blacklisted but it has no bitcoin or even satoshi left which is why you can’t send any bitcoin

comments.author: Pidgeon
comments.body: Your address is indeed blocked, I tried to send you some coins and they are bouncing backhttps://mempool.space/tx/1a06e72cf53077870e5f98db4dad95b9fd828dc3e7afb4e37c57d2d3bcdbbcd7

comments.author: elevates
comments.body: Was this post reported to the mods. If someone did submit I don't this post will get deleted. The simple reason being mods don't want anyone to think that such post are legitimate and ofcourse are made for genuine reasons. I sometime think that such scam begging post should be kept alive for morenthan 48hours. Generally they get deleted instantly and we won't nfind any resources to sernan example how begging scam work. Kudos! To everyone who were able to decipher this individuals.objective.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: Stvru on September 03, 2023, 09:18:03 PMI thinks iam legendry in this job , when u like me resolve to me my problemYou are the person who can resolve the problem by yourself by sending coins to your wallet through p2p or purchasing it from exchange. Bitcoin address never expired and I don't think it can be lock. If you can't send it form your other address then you have to try it from a centralized exchange. And this is what the forum can use to help you by telling you what to do and not to help you with bitcoin. There is no free bitcoin in the forum to give you or to test any frozen,lock address. You method of trying to acquire bitcoin in the forum has failed.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: It was somewhat strange the OP tried to get free Bitcoins under the guise of testing what is/was wrong with his address. I think the lack of written English comprehension is part of the deception. Over the years many different tactics have been used to try to get others to part with their crypto and sometimes they have worked but now more and more people are careful. You cannot believe everything that is being posted.Quote from: Mate2237 on September 04, 2023, 04:07:25 PMQuote from: Stvru on September 03, 2023, 09:18:03 PMI thinks iam legendry in this job , when u like me resolve to me my problemYou are the person who can resolve the problem by yourself by sending coins to your wallet through p2p or purchasing it from exchange. Bitcoin address never expired and I don't think it can be lock. If you can't send it form your other address then you have to try it from a centralized exchange. And this is what the forum can use to help you by telling you what to do and not to help you with bitcoin. There is no free bitcoin in the forum to give you or to test any frozen,lock address.
